description:
This course will introduce graduate students in NUS to
topics arising in quantum information, computation, and
cryptography. The course will be taught by a research
fellow, providing a unique opportunity to learn advanced
material from an active researcher in the field of interest.
title: Quantum Information and Cryptography
faculty: NUS Graduate Sch for Int Science and Engineering
prerequisite:
This module is open to all students at CQT, and those in
Computer Science, Mathematics, and in Physics.
Students from other departments and faculties are
welcome, but it is advisable that they discuss their
background with the lecturer before registering.
